trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Bastrop
There were no other sightings in Bastrop on or around August 30th 2011
divs: Sighting Details1.Working in back yard 2.Light out of corner of my eye 3.Very low flying, large commercial airline but without wings, tail, or noise 4.Object very large, flying very low and in straight line from NE of home to W of home 5.Very complicated; my thoughts kept denying what I was seeing and try to make since of it; kept telling myself I was mistaken, and that this must be an airplane at an unusual angle and that was why I couldn't see any wings or tail; the fact that it made no noise and appearing so close was very confusing. 6.Object flew out of sight; live in forest, so tall trees blocked further view
Summary: working in back yard and orange object out of corner of my eye; looked up and saw orange cigar shaped object
